name: Hamster Line Trip
description:
A scientist in the laboratory swapped himself with a hamster in the experiment. When he woke up, he found that he could not communicate with humans. He is now trying to escape from here  to prevent the experiment.

He is looking for a way to escape from the skyscraper? But is it just any ordinary hamster? He found out that he got a brush can draw lines in the real world!!

Draw lines to help the hamster escape and avoid the scientists and other hazards!

You can also select the level to decide the difficulty of the game.

This game was made for GSAS-4520 | Game Development I
